mapper.select: select count(*) from med where CONCAT(#{0},"") like medId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO med ( medId, medName, medName_f, medNmae_p, medStruct, medDet, medUnit, medClass, med_before, medDate, medPositionSeq, medJuice, img ) values( #{medId}, #{medName}, #{medName_f}, #{medNmae_p}, #{medStruct}, #{medDet}, #{medUnit}, #{medClass}, #{med_before}, #{medDate}, #{medPositionSeq}, #{medJuice}, #{img} );
mapper.select: select * from med where CONCAT(#{0},"") like medId
